Phase47Description: I've been go speak to a collector of Curios named Rakhaan who knows more about these strange and sinister relics.
Callback53Header: Perform the gesture spell on the relic

Callback51Header: Search the Searing Pools for the relic
Phase0Description: I found an injured person searching for strange relic hidden amongst the artifacts found around the Searing Pools.

Name: Curious Curios
